messages.author: zel
messages.text:
why don't we remove this if this function is no longer needed?

also file a bug to remove this event from extension API as well

messages.author: tbarzic
messages.text:
On 2011/08/09 00:09:45, zel wrote:
> why don't we remove this if this function is no longer needed?
> 
> also file a bug to remove this event from extension API as well

I think it would be better that we leave it in extension API for now because we might still need it (e.g. for displaying unformatted devices, which don't get detected with MountComplete event).

messages.author: tbarzic
messages.text:
On 2011/08/09 00:09:45, zel wrote:
> why don't we remove this?

Done.

messages.author: zel
messages.text: is this param now really mount_path? or is it mount_source_path?

messages.author: tbarzic
messages.text:
On 2011/08/09 00:09:45, zel wrote:
> is this param now really mount_path? or is it mount_source_path?

Its really mount_path.. calling with source path does unmount device, but GetMountPoints does not work fine with it..
